caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. FRANK JAMES GLANTZ, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Clark County, No. 87-1-00852-5, John N. Skimas, J., entered January 8, 1988.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Draper, J. Pro Tem., concurred in by Petrich, A.C.J., and Alexander, J.
